thread.title: Great visit.
thread.title_full: Great visit. - Review of The Time New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mercury4u2
title: Great visit.
text: My wife and I got tickets to see The Bronx Tale. We needed a place close to the theater and ran across the Time on West 49th St. Centrally located in the theater district we fell in love with the place. Great customer service from the front desk to Lisa as our concierge and the Batman dude hustling bags. Rooms were comfortable and clean. The only downer was only one out of two of their elevators were functioning! More steps on the fitbit.
